== New Features ==

** ACPICA: update to version 20140214. (LP: #1281096)

== Fixed Bugs ==

** acpi: method: fix ppc64el build failure (LP: #1272265)
** acpi: acpidump: handle invalid MADT table data (LP: #1278422)
** cpu: cpufreq: tidy code, show advice when cpu scaling unavailable (LP: #1267959)
** lib: fwts_release: call lsb_release rather than parsing raw data (LP: #1266823)
** lib: fwts_acpi_tables: fix parsing of empty data (LP: #1281197)
** data: klog.json: lower the level of the failure when the _S1 and _S2 not implemented (LP: #1279714)
